content: practice everything granny square on this easy and cozy crochet cocoon cardigan stitched in caron colorama bamboo blend this lighthearted garment will get you comfortable with the basic techniques for granny crocheting including double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet front post assembly and much more we selected 4 cool tones for a perfect summertime layer materials caron® colorama bamboo blend™ 8 oz/227 g 396 yds/363 m sizes xs/s/m l/xl/2xl 3/4/5xl clear sky 82008 5 6 8 balls sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s/m 28-38 71-96 5 cm l/xl/2xl 40-48 101 5-122 cm 3/4/5xl 54-62 137-157 5 cm
